name: Flipski
description:
Left and right arrows to do cool flips! Don't crash!

Originally created in (about) three hours for Trijam #149 - Theme:"Flipped"

Created using Godot

Sounds: https://hitrison.itch.io/menu-sfx-pack

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/snowtop-caps-font.html
